channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
How do i open the files, like shop.cfg. It won't let me open it it says:
To open this file, windows needs to know what program created it. Windows can go online to look it up automatically, or you can manually select a list of programs on your computer.
If someone can help me, i would appreciate it very much. I really need this help. Thanks
~lele~[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 03:07:23 PM[/size][hr]help me?

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Blake11roys Blake11roys
item.description:
@Blake11roys wrote:

select choose from a list of programs and then choose notepad and it should work

Read full topic
